R

retireDemon() - Method in class Demon
Function that retires a demon, making the thread stop, eliminating it from matrix and demons array
run() - Method in class Coven
We start the thread that resets the coven ingredients every 10 seconds.
run() - Method in class CovenReset
Every 10s we reset the ingredients and scare the demons making them sleep for 1 second This function represents the thread
run() - Method in class Demon
Function that represents the thread.
run() - Method in class DemonSpawner
The thread function Spawns a demon every 500-1000 ms
run() - Method in class GrandSorcerer
We print the number of potions the sorcerer has and we check every 2 seconds if all undead were defeated in order to stop the program
run() - Method in class Undead
Thread specific function Sends the undead to the coven and checks if there is no witch defending the coven If there is no witch the undead resets the ingredients in coven After 500-1000 ms the undead leaves the coven and picks another one
run() - Method in class Witch
The thread specific function The witch creates a potion with each coven visit if there are ingredients The witch picks a coven to defend.
